results.headline: The Doctor Who Went Into the Ukrainian Cold
results.summary_short: Henry Marsh is a British brain surgeon whose humanity and talent with power drills make him an uncommonly enthralling linchpin.

results.headline: Girl Meets Ape, and Complications Ensue

results.headline: Physician, Drug Thyself: Psychiatrist in Hollywood

results.headline: Perusing the Homoerotic Playbook

results.headline: Beneath the Veil of the Immigrant Dream

results.headline: New Kid in the House, Clearly Up to Something

results.headline: Last Exit to Queens: Sex-Trafficking Victims and Credulous Criminals
